name: Track Listening History
description:
Get your recently played tracks and listening history from Spotify. See what you've been listening to and when.

You can:
- View recently played tracks
- Filter by date range
- See play timestamps
- Get track and artist information
- Track listening patterns

Requires Spotify API credentials via OAuth.

** WHEN TO USE **
- User asks for "recently played" or "listening history"
- User wants to see what they played
- User wants to recall a song they heard recently
- User wants to analyze their listening habits

** WHEN NOT TO USE **
- User wants to search for music (use search_music)
- User wants recommendations (use get_music_recommendations)
- User wants to play a track (use play_track)

** EXAMPLES **

1. Get last 20 played tracks:
{
  "limit": 20
}

2. Get recently played with timestamp filtering:
{
  "limit": 50,
  "after_timestamp": 1699000000000
}

limit.description: Number of recently played tracks to return (1-50, default: 20)

after_timestamp.description: Unix timestamp in milliseconds - only get tracks played after this time

before_timestamp.description: Unix timestamp in milliseconds - only get tracks played before this time
